s.text: Otherwise, high season rates generally apply February through May and late July to the end of September.

Otherwise, high season rates generally apply February through May and late July to the end of September.

At the same time, the hotel offerings across the island are rapidly being expanded, and visitors can now choose from hotels, quintas (villas), estalagens and pousadas (inns) along the coasts and in the villages and mountains of the interior.

Room price guidelines below are for a double room with bath in high season, including breakfast and VAT (value-added tax).
